events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will review the submitted resume and cover letter for relevant experience.
The application has been categorised under Engineering based on keywords like software developer and engineer appearing in the candidate's profile.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the candidate's hiring process for the software engineering role.
Initial phone screening was completed successfully; the candidate demonstrated solid knowledge of software development best practices.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the further interview invite, expressing enthusiasm about the technical aspects of the role.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team next week to assess coding and problem-solving skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating proficiency in coding algorithms and system design concepts.
Following the positive technical interview, the HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture and compensation details.
